Message.Text: Hey Tommy, can you believe how much beer they're planning to have at the conference?
I know, right? It’s like they think this is just a party or something. Isn’t it supposed to be a tech event?
Exactly! I didn’t sign up for a drinking contest. What if we actually want to learn something?
And sharing a room? Great, just what I need. No chance for some peace and quiet.
Right? It’s going to be a nightmare if someone gets too drunk and starts making noise.
Seriously! I just wanted to focus on networking, not babysitting someone who can’t handle their drinks.
And who even thought it was a good idea to combine beer and a tech conference? So frustrating!
Ugh, I just hope we can actually manage to get some valuable insights amidst all this chaos.
Yeah, let’s just try to make the best of it, but I’m not looking forward to the drunken mess.
